testcase.name: Validation of myAccount dropdown with respect to login
testcase.system-out: Given Openchrome and start the application..................................passed When User clicks on MyAccount dropdown......................................passed And Click on login..........................................................passed Then System should navigate to login page...................................passed

testcase.name: Login with valid username and password
testcase.system-out: Given Open chrome and navigate to login page................................passed When User enters valid "<username>" and "<password>"........................passed And Click on login button...................................................passed Then User should get logged in..............................................passed

testcase.name: Validate login with invalid data
testcase.system-out: Given Open chrome browser and navigate to login page........................passed When Enter invalid credentials in "user1" and "hello" fields................passed And Click on login button for login.........................................passed Then It should display error message........................................passed

testcase.name: Validation of forgot password link
testcase.system-out: Given User is on login page.................................................passed When User clicks on forget password link....................................passed Then System navigates to Forgot password page...............................passed
